Quest_Name: Home is Where You Make It

Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[The Fate of Atlantis | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — The Fate of Atlantis]]''

MemoryInfobox.image: ACOD FoA ToH Home is Where You Make It 01.png
MemoryInfobox.description: 'All souls deserve a home, so Charon asked Kassandra to find such a place for a family that lost theirs in life. But the road to peace would prove dangerous—the Hound of Hades|Hounds of Hades had picked up the family's scent.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey – The Fate of Atlantis: Torment of Hades'
MemoryInfobox.location: Elysium Breach, The Scorched Lands, the Underworld

General_Description: '''Home is Where You Make It''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2020 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra agreed to help [[Charon]] relocate a family who was being hunted by the [[Hound of Hades|Hounds]] of [[Hades]].
Section_Dialogue:
After [[A Cursed Sickness|helping the sick woman]] to be cleansed at the [[Thanatos Pyre]], Kassandra spoke to Charon near [[Theion Pits]].
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I brought the woman to the pyre.''
*'''Charon:''' ''Ah, I like having an assistant. If only you were dead, you could stay forever.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Unfortunately... Not my plan.''
*'''Charon:''' ''Such is life. And death. on to the next lost souls. A family devastated by wars wanders without refuge.''
<tabber>
|-|I know how that feels.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I know how it feels to lose a home.''
|-|That's the cost of war.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Plenty of people lose everything in war.''
</tabber>
*'''Charon:''' ''Yes, you all have sad stories to tell. At least most who come here are dead now.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I think I would still be sad if I was dead.''
*'''Charon:''' ''The suffering you fleshlings inflict on each other never ceases to astound me. And that's why we are helping all the lost we can.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You're right, they deserve to have somewhere safe to stay.''
[[File:ACOD FoA ToH Home is Where You Make It 02.png|thumb|250px|Kassandra meets the family]]
Kassandra travelled to the [[Village of the Condemned]], where the lost family were residing in.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Looks like someone is hidding over there.''
She approached the family: a couple and a child.
*'''Mortal Woman:''' ''Please, don't hurt us. Leave us alone.''
*'''Mortal Man:''' ''Stay back! I know how to fight.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm not here to hurt you.''
*'''Mortal Man:''' ''Then what do you want?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I've come to take you away from this place. Take you somewhere safe.''
*'''Mortal Man:''' ''Why would you want to help us?''
<tabber>
|-|I was asked to help you.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I was asked to find you and take you to safety.''
*'''Mortal Woman:''' ''We have no friends here, only each other.  But the hounds are drawing close, so what choice do we have?''
|-|We need to leave now.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''There's no time, the hounds of Hades are coming, and when they find you...''
*'''Mortal Man:''' ''I can't let my family suffer here anymore. All right, what's your plan?''
</tabber>
*'''Kassandra:''' ''There has to be somewhere nearby where you'd be safe.''
*'''Mortal Man:''' ''There's a cave not too far from here that could provide some shelter. It didn't look very exciting, but it's better than here.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Anywhere else?''
*'''Mortal Woman:''' ''There was also an abandoned camp. It would be ideal if not for all the strange creatures in the area... It could be dangerous.''
<tabber>
|-|I'll take you to the cave.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''We should go to the cave. Stay close.''
Kassandra escorted the family to the outskirts. Riding on horses, they followed the road on their way to the cave.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I hear something. We need to hurry. We're too exposed out here.''
Along the way, they encountered numerous hounds of Hades.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The hounds! Stay behind me.''
Kassandra eliminated the hounds. She and the family continued their way and reach the cave. There, they were ambushed by the [[Erinyes]].
*'''Mortal Child:''' ''Help! The Erinyes are coming!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The sisters of vengeance are... real?''
After Kassandra took care of the attackers, the family was able to reside in their new home.
Kassandra spoke to the man again.
*'''Mortal Man:''' ''We'll be safe here. Thank you for helping us.''
|-|I'll take you to the camp.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''We should go to the camp. Stay close.''
Kassandra escorted the family to the outskirts. Riding on horses, they followed the road on their way to the camp.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I hear something. We need to hurry. We're too exposed out here.''
Along the way, they encountered numerous hounds of Hades.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The hounds! Stay behind me.''
Kassandra eliminated the hounds. She and the family continued their way and reach the camp site, where she found numerous [[soldier]]s, After killing them and their captain, the family was thus able to reside there.
Kassandra spoke to the woman again.
*'''Mortal Woman:''' ''This camp will serve us well. Thank you, you've been a true friend.''
</tabber>
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped to relocate the lost family to safety.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' – ''[[The Fate of Atlantis: Torment of Hades]]''
